newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan dealer launches new Porsche Boxter.
newsitem.headline: Japan dealer launches new Porsche Boxter.

text.p: Mizwa Motors Corp, the sole importer-distributor in Japan for Porsche AG cars, said on Tuesday it had launched a completely new Boxter two-seater convertible sports car.
Mizwa plans to sell 1,000 Boxters in the year to September 1997, a Mizwa spokesman said. The car's Japanese selling price will start at 5.95 million yen.
The Boxter, powered by a 2.5-litre Flat-Six engine, comes in six versions, four of which are right-hand-drive.
Mizwa also launched the 1997 model Porsche 911 series with a sales target of 1,500 cars in 1996/97. Its Japanese selling price starts at 9.45 million yen.
